page.title: 09 KATES SATURDAY
page.content: On Saturday I get up at 8.15am as I go to{badminton}training at Redhill Leisure Centre.It is a rush to get ready but I make it for 9.00am.We warm up by running around the badminton courts.I play till 12.00am then I walk home.At home Mum is cooking the dinner.Chips,peas and sausages and a yogurt for afters.Sometimes we go to {Arnold}in the afternoon and get the shopping.I dont like getting the vegatables but I love looking around Preedys at all the bits and bobs they sell like stationary and ornaments.We get home and have a quick snack for tea.Then I might go to a{swimming gala.I swim for Arnold swimming club and swim butterfly and frontcrawl.If I swim well Dad buys me a bag of chips.At home I watch{T.V}such as Kenny Everet,Dyinasty and spooky films.Then I go to bed and read.
